properties.address: Ilmington Village Hall, Front Street, Ilmington, Warwickshire CV36 4LD
properties.description:
We combine our hub with wellbeing activities as we found this to be a better option to just offering tea/coffee and snacks. We offer tai chi, Parkinson’s exercise, table tennis, and indoor curling and after each event we like to offer tea/coffee and biscuits as a social opportunity. Also once a month on Wednesdays there is a meeting with a speaker or entertainment for the over 65s with cakes and tea.

This information is provided by a community group so it is advisable to check opening times with them directly, particularly over holiday periods.

hours._text: Every Monday, 9.30am-10.30am; Tuesday, 10.00am-11.00 and 2.00pm-3.00pm; Thursday, 2.30pm - 3.30pm. Then once a month on Wednesday, 2.00pm-4.00pm
